Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the availability of recordings and transcripts of meetings of the New York state public authorities control board
Summary: Requires recordings and transcripts of meetings of the New York state public authorities control board be posted and maintained on its public website.
LawCode: Amd ยง51, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the availability of recordings and transcripts of meetings of the New York state public authorities control board
